title: Since there's an Aether Wing Kayle
body: Can there be a Nether Wing Morgana?

replies.body: At this point ill take one good morg skin .-.
sinful succulence? or bewitching? or lunar wraith?
Dont forget my Ghost Bride. Its good right? Right ?

> [{quoted}](name=DoktorKaiser,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=1dUm8OfE,comment-id=000000000004,timestamp=2017-06-23T21:07:23.187+0000)
>
> Dont forget my Ghost Bride. Its good right? Right ?

I think it's decent for its age. Probably one of the better ones.

I love its color, especially the pool color. Also I laugh every time when I recall because at the time this skin was released (season 4 I believe) Morg was a super popular support and everyone used this skin, so when they recalled and she started screaming whole Twich chat would spam "stfu Morg" , so remembering that always puts a smile on my face :)
Well it would be cooler if it was like a rival skin to aether wing kayle

what about riot invoker morg?

better yet, get a full set of riot invokers that are rivals to the riot skins
Yeah, but I don't think it fits Morgana's theme too well, but it is a great theme for some other champion.
Lunar Wraith is a skin I'm mad I missed.

Sinful Is meh not really great
Bewitching splash is good in game sucks
Lunar Wraith - That one Could see that one being seen as good but I dont think its that great (OPinion i guess)

Her model's just kind of ugly in general... even the best skin on her right now only looks okay.

She could use the new model a legendary skin would bring.
This is a great idea imo. I would love it <3

I'd really like to have a skin like this for Morg (despite the fact she has a lot of purple/blue skins already) once she gets her complete VGU. 

Just imagining some evil version of Kayle's skin and a complete update to Aether Wing Kayle (along with her complete VGU, as well). New Versus event, anyone? 

Also, this Hearthstone card came to mind. I think the color palette would be perfect.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IybUbwPtzHw

ALSO: Weird side note. While I think Aether Wing Kayle needs a complete update, I think the death animation should be similar to how it is now. It's one of my favorite death animations/sounds. Oddly satisfying. And I think it'd be pretty neat if Morgana's death animation/sound was similar.
Probably after the Rework alongside with Kayle :/
